text: Geislingen is a town in Zollernalbkreis in Baden-WÃ¼rttemberg in Germany. It is 60 km south of Stuttgart and 3 km west of Balingen. It has three districts: Geislingen, Erlaheim and Binsdorf. Geislingen was first mentioned in 1188. The economy is based on agriculture. Many people work in industrial areas south of Stuttgart or in nearby Balingen. == Twin towns == Geislingen is twinned with: * Ruoms, France == References == Category:Zollernalbkreis
title: Geislingen, Zollernalbkreis
